title: Ticket #10: Non-XML data in -xml output from condor_q
description:
As reported Michael Thomas to condor-users, 

[root@XXX ~]# condor_q -xml

-- Submitter: YYY : <ZZZ> : PPP
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE classads SYSTEM "classads.dtd">
<classads>
...
The output from condor_q -xml contains non-XML, making it difficult to pass to an XML parser directly.

https://lists.cs.wisc.edu/archive/condor-users/2008-December/msg00103.shtml
check_ins: 2009-Jul-30 14:34   Check-in [15213]: Removed non-xml data from condor_q -xml output Resolves #10 VERSION HISTORY: condor_q -xml now does not output things like "-- Submitter: ..." (By Matthew Farrellee )
creator: matt
